headline: Swing-State Senate Democrats Furious Over Biden Admin Decision On…
sentences: According to The Western Journal, three Republican-run states made an announcement on Monday that they will be filing lawsuits against the administration over the decision it reached to end the imposition of the public health order known as Title 42, which allowed for the summary expulsion of illegal aliens without needing to hear their asylum cases because of the coronavirus pandemic.

pic.twitter.com/BK6nsf5m25
— Washington Free Beacon (@FreeBeacon) March 30, 2022
“The fact that the Biden administration doesn’t have the support of all of its senators is pretty damning, particularly when you consider all of them save Manchin come from swing states — where a hot-button issue like illegal immigration issue could easily tip a close election,” the report claimed.

(TeaParty.org Exclusive) – Not only are members of the GOP launching an all-out assault on Joe Biden for his administration’s decision to bring Title 42’s provisions along the southern border to an end without having any sort of strategy in place to control the border crisis, but it seems some Democrats aren’t too happy about it either.
